title: Miscellany
author: Ibn Tibon, Mosheh
description: Contents: Isaac ben Abraham ibn Latif, Shaʿar ha-shamayim (ff. 1r-74r). Abraham ben Meïr Ibn Ezra, Yesod Mora ṿe-Sod Ha-Torah (ff. 74v-85v). Abraham ben Meïr Ibn Ezra, Sefer ha-Shem (ff. 86r-91r). Abraham bar Hiyya Savasorda, Hegiyon ha-nefesh ha-ʿatsuvah (ff. 91v-97v). Isaac ben Abraham ibn Latif, Ginze ha-melekh (ff. 98r-128v). Isaac ben Abraham ibn Latif, Tsurat ʿolam (ff. 129r-148r). Isaac ben Abraham ibn Latif, Tseror ha-mor (ff. 148v-151v). Isaac ben Abraham ibn Latif, Rav peʿalim (ff. 152r-156r). Mosheh Ibn Tibon, Commentary on the Writings (Song of Songs) (ff. 157r-180v). David Kimhi, Perush maʿaśeh Bereshit (ff. 181v-186v). David Kimhi, Perush maʿaśeh merkhavah (ff. 186v-192v). Moses ben Shem Tov de Leon, ʾOr zaruaʿ (ff. 193r-200v).
